conbody.p: Select the Windows icon in the Run button on the main Toolbar to execute the script.
The Windows test is executed with those recorded steps accordingly.

ol.li: Remember not to lock your screen while spying, recording or executing a test on a desktop application.
You're recommended not to run multiple applications simultaneously.
To start a UWP application, the application's execute file should be:

ul.li: ApplicationID if your app is published on Microsoft store.
PackageFamilyName!Application ID if your app is still in development.
